mapper.insert: insert into bedroom (imageIndex, productName, cateE, cateK, price, saveFileName) values (#{imageIndex}, #{productName}, #{cateE}, #{cateK}, #{price}, #{saveFileName})
mapper.select: select imageIndex, productName, cateE, cateK, price, saveFileName from bedroom order by imageIndex desc
select imageIndex, productName, cateE, cateK, price, saveFileName from bedroom where cateE=#{cateE} order by imageIndex desc
select imageIndex, productName, cateE, cateK, price, saveFileName from bedroom where imageIndex=#{imageIndex} and cateE=#{cateE}
